title: SPY Presents Belgian The Funk Up: Waffles, Trails, Heartaches & Ales – The 2014 BWR Story
description:
A heartfelt tale of pain, trails and ales, Belgian The Funk Up is a picturesque view of the 2014 SPY Belgian Waffle Ride. 

Created in the spirit of the great Spring monuments, the SPY Belgian Waffle Ride (BWR) took the peloton on a 135-mile ronde through North County San Diego, where it clattered through aragrarian hamlets and Ardenne-like hills—and 11,000 feet of never ending climbs—along dirt or roughly paved roads carved through inland San Diego’s beautiful rural and sometimes forested backcountry. 

The most unique one day cycling event in the country, register for the 2015 BWR here: https://www.bikereg.com/spybwr


To learn more about SPY, visit http://www.spyoptic.com
